name: gbln
description: GBLN - Goblin Bounded Lean Notation for JavaScript. Type-safe, memory-efficient, LLM-native data format.

scripts.build:wasm: cd rust-wasm && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir ../pkg/nodejs --out-name gbln --release
scripts.build:wasm:web: cd rust-wasm && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../pkg/web --out-name gbln --release
scripts.build:wasm:bundler: cd rust-wasm && wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir ../pkg/bundler --out-name gbln --release

author: Vivian Burkhard Voss <ask+gbln@vvoss.dev>
